ygData.subject: RE: Lifetaps and Races
ygData.msgSnippet: Since I ve never played a troll or an Ogre how many more Hps do they have compared to a DE or Human? Anybody happen to know? ... From: Chip Paul
ygData.messageBody:
Since I've never played a troll or an Ogre how many more Hps do they have
compared to a DE or Human? Anybody happen to know?



-----Original Message-----
From: Chip Paul [mailto:cpaul@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 9:46 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Lifetaps and Races


From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>

"Wilson, ThomasX B" wrote:
>
> So what do you all think? Are larger races more powerful SK's? Both PVE
and
> PVP.
>
> Enjoy..

I think large races make better tanks in general, due to the higher
str and more hp's. The Troll makes an ideal shadowknight because of
the regeneration and the lack of healing. Dark elves make better
casters,
and lack in the physical aspects. Oh, and one of the biggest concerns,
the large races bash without a shield.

Do you think Erudite Paladins suffer a similar fate when compared to
a dwarf? Maybe not because there is no bash/slam argument, but it
still seems they are at a disadvantage.

Myself, I carry both a 2H and a 1H/Shield and swap them via the
hotkeys when I need to fight a healer (ala Cazic)

Xilith

-= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
